description: Quickly seared rump steak makes a delicious topping for spicy beef broth based ramen.
name: Chilli Beef Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5cm ginger, peeled and sliced into matchsticks
1.8L beef stock, made with 2 stock cubes, hot
4 medium spring onions, sliced, tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large griddle pan on the highest setting. Toss the beef strips in a bowl with half of the oil and cook for 2 minutes on each side. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Heat the rest of the oil in a deep pan, stir in the garlic, ginger and half of the chilli and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Bring the soup back to the boil, add the noodles and cook for 4 minutes, stir in the spring onions and cook for 2 minutes. Season with soy sauce to taste.
Serve in bowls with steak, chilli, spinach, spring onion tops and a drizzle of sesame oil on top.
